ResourceHeader.ResourceName: All-sky auroral image taken by the white-light all-sky camera at Tjornes, Iceland.
ResourceHeader.Description: Auroral image in the JPEG format taken by the white-light all-sky CCD camera (body: WATEC WAT-120N+, lens: FUJINON YV2.2Ã—1.4A-SA2) at Tjornes, Iceland.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please contact Dr. Akira Kadokura (kadokura [at] nipr.ac.jp) or Dr. Tetsuo Motoba (motoba.tetsuo [at] nipr.ac.jp), National Institute of Polar Research (NIPR) before using the data at any publications and/or presentations. We welcome collaborative research and strongly recommend users to contact us early in order to ensure that the data are suitable for their research. When the data are used at any publications and/or presentations, we would like to ask the users to acknowledge NIPR and send us one copy of the reprints. An example of the acknowledgement statement is as follows: "Aurora images were provided by National Institute of Polar Research, Japan."

DisplayData.Keyword: EARTH SCIENCE Sun-earch Interaction Ionosphere/Magnetosphere Dynamics Aurorae
